mapper.select: select A.bookmark_id AS bookmarkId ,A.member_uuid AS memberUuid ,B.name AS memberName ,A.apt_Seq AS aptSeq ,C.apt_nm AS aptName ,A.created_at AS createdAt ,A.updated_at AS updatedAt FROM bookmarks AS A LEFT OUTER JOIN member AS B ON A.member_uuid = B.member_uuid LEFT OUTER JOIN houseinfos AS C ON A.apt_seq = C.apt_seq WHERE A.member_uuid = #{memberUuid} ORDER BY A.updated_at DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bookmarks (member_uuid,apt_Seq, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{memberUuid}, #{aptSeq}, NOW(), NOW())
